channel.title: Project Management on Tools for Academic Research
channel.description: Recent content in Project Management on Tools for Academic Research

item.title: Enago Read
item.description: Enago Read is an AI assistant that speeds up the literature review process, offering summaries and key insights to save researchers reading time. It boosts productivity with advanced AI technology and the Copilot feature, enabling real-time questions for deeper comprehension of extensive literature. (It was called RAx.)

item.title: A.R.I.A. (Aria)
item.description: Aria is Your AI Research Assistant Powered by Large Language Models

item.title: Bordio
item.description: Bordio is a productivity platform for organizing all your tasks, events, and projects in one single place.

item.title: MyLabBook
item.description: An open source research platform or ELN based on WordPress and the FAIR Data Toolkit that is Sustainable, Affordable, FAIR, and Easy.

item.title: PaperDigest
item.description: Sci-Tech knowledge graph & text analysis platform for scientific literature tracking, summarization and search

item.title: Dendron
item.description: Opensource knowledge management inside your vscode editor, with linked notes, and tools for publishing notes.

item.title: Logseq
item.description: Logseq is a joyful, open-source outliner that works on top of local plain-text Markdown and Org-mode files. Use it to write, organize and share your thoughts, keep your to-do list, and build your own digital garden.

item.title: Modern Lab Community
item.description: Community for researchers to share best practices.

item.title: Colabra
item.description: Collaborative ELN and Project Management

item.title: Gatsby knowledge base theme
item.description: Create your Second Brain by writing down your thoughts - or as the term used this theme topics - and their relations in markdown.

item.title: Data Stewardship Wizard
item.description: Create Smart Data Management Plans for FAIR Open Science

item.title: Dataverse
item.description: Open source research data repository software that can be setup easily

item.title: Litmaps
item.description: Navigate the literature with interactive visualisations of citation networks and discover science faster

item.title: Paperpile
item.description: Reference manager made by scientists for scientists using modern technology

item.title: FOAM
item.description: A personal knowledge management and sharing system for VSCode

item.title: SciWheel
item.description: Reference Manager to discover, read, annotate, write and share scientific research

item.title: SciNote
item.description: SciNote Electronic Lab Notebook (ELN). Top-rated solution trusted by the FDA & 70k+ scientists in 100+ countries.

item.title: RSpace
item.description: The next-gen eLab notebook with free data storage and free version.

item.title: Labstep
item.description: Unify your scientific data documentation through Labstep’s all-in-one cloud solution. Connect your notebook, inventory, data collection and downstream analysis. Share your records in a secure environment.

item.title: Labii
item.description: User-friendly, fully customizable Electronic Lab Notebook and Laboratory Information Management System

item.title: Labguru
item.description: Run your lab more efficiently and maximize your research output. Plan and document experiments, track progress, streamline lab logistics, and share results.

item.title: Labfolder
item.description: A reliable infrastructure for your data

item.title: Labcollector
item.description: All-in-One Lab notebook and management platform.

item.title: Labarchives
item.description: The Leading Research Data Management Platform.

item.title: Hivebench
item.description: Everything you need to do research: Plan, Experiment, Publish.

item.title: eLabFTW
item.description: A free and open source electronic lab notebook designed by researchers, for researchers, with usability in mind.

item.title: Benchling
item.description: Electronic Lab Notebook done right. Bringing life to life science R&D by transforming your R&D with the industry’s most widely adopted Life Sciences R&D Cloud.

item.title: Scrapbox
item.description: A knowledge base that lets you capture notes, code, and research lightning-fast. Everything adds to a web of ideas that’s easy to use at scale.

item.title: RemNote
item.description: The first spaced-repetition powered note-taking tool that lets you structure knowledge exactly in the way you think about it.

item.title: Supernotes
item.description: card based note-taking with links between cards

item.title: RAx - Your Personal Smart Research Assistant (Rebranded to Enago Read)
item.description: (Rebranded to Enago Read) Speed up literature analysis and comprehension with RAx. Smart assistant to explore, collate insights and organize your research easily.

item.title: Obsidian
item.description: note-taking with zettelkasten method (linked notes)

item.title: RoamResearch
item.description: Online note-taking with zettelkasten method (connected notes)

item.title: Notion
item.description: Write, plan, collaborate, and get organized — all in one tool. Write connected notes with rich format and Export to markdown, pdf, etc.

item.title: Semantic Scholar
item.description: Semantic Scholar uses groundbreaking AI and engineering to understand the semantics of scientific literature to help Scholars discover relevant research.

item.title: Calendly
item.description: Calendly helps you schedule meetings without the back-and-forth emails

item.title: Doodle
item.description: It shouldn’t take 30 emails to schedule a 30-minute meeting. Book meetings faster with the smart scheduling power of Doodle

item.title: Whimsical
item.description: Visual workspace, online tool for quick diagrams

item.title: Quiver
item.description: Programmer’s notebook, math + Markdown, code snippet.

item.title: Gliffy
item.description: Diagram software that works as hard as your team.

item.title: Processon
item.description: Online Mindmap, FlowChart, MindMap, UI, UML and Network charts with Collabration in Real-time.

item.title: Plectica
item.description: Plectica is helps us managing our mind. It is more flexible than mindmaps.

item.title: HackMD
item.description: Online markdown editor with collaborations and sharing built-in.

item.title: Findings App
item.description: Your research assistant & lab notebook, all in one app.

item.title: Github Pages
item.description: Hosted directly from your GitHub repository. Just edit, push, and your changes are live. Integrated with Jekyll and turns markdown posts automatically. Jekyll is a tool for blogging.

item.title: Read the Docs
item.description: Read the Docs simplifies software documentation by automating building, versioning, and hosting of your docs for you.

item.title: Gitbook
item.description: Online tool for personal and team knowledge management.

item.title: Sphinx
item.description: Sphinx is a tool for python code documentation generation. It is also a very good tool to take digital notes since it supports images, equations, tables, code blocks, etc.

item.title: Taskade
item.description: Taskade is a beautiful project management tool for both personal use and team collaborations. Taskade ships with task management and note-taking tools.

item.title: Todoist
item.description: Multi-platform tool to track and analyze tasks.

item.title: Anydo
item.description: Anydo comes with a very useful daily review and reminder. Anydo also integrates with its own utilities such as calenders.

item.title: Evernote
item.description: Not so lightweight but still very good for managing life especially since it has got a lot of integrations from a lot of other services.

item.title: Google Keep
item.description: Google Keep is light-weight. It comes with powerful search. The App ships with simple drawing and handwriting.

item.title: Microsoft To Do
item.description: Task management tool backed by Microsoft and works on most platforms.

item.title: Pomotodo
item.description: A mix of todo list and pomodoro timer, with sync across devices and weekly report.

item.title: GitHub
item.description: GitHub is the most popular platform for git with social and collaborations built-in.

item.title: Gitlab
item.description: Gitlab provides git hosting, collaborations, social, automations, and more. GitLab can be both cloud-based and self-hosted using its opensource code.
